title: Canvas of Dreams
description: "Riya seems to have lost everythingâ€”the man she loves to another woman, her husband to death and her soul to fear.When she finally realizes her dream of opening an art gallery, however, things begin to look up. On the one hand, she is working closely with the handsome artist, Rehaan. On the other, her first love Ryan comes back into her life, and the other woman is out of the picture.But can she move on from her past, or will its long fingers cast a shadow on everything she does?"
author: Jaya Siva Murty
